Package ru.nsu.buzyurkin

Class AdjacencyMatrixGraph<V,​W extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.buzyurkin.AdjacencyMatrixGraph<V,​W>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of values stored in the graph's nodes.
    W - The type of weights associated with the graph's edges (must be a subclass of Number).
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<V,​W>
    public class AdjacencyMatrixGraph<V,​W extends java.lang.Number>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph<V,​W>
    This class represents an implementation of a graph using an adjacency matrix.

      AdjacencyMatrixGraph()
      Constructs an empty AdjacencyMatrixGraph.
